title: *+*+3 BED 2 BATHROOM HOUSE FOR RENT*+*+
posting_body: Courtland Ave,  Welcome to 13509 Courtland Avenue; a charming and delightful 3 bedroom bungalow that has been well maintained & cared for over the years.
As you enter the front door with stained glass panels, you're invited into the bright and open Living Room with newer carpet.
From there you will find the large Eat-In kitchen with white wood cabinetry, formica countertops, and ceramic tile backsplash.
A great view of the beautiful backyard is offered from this room.
Two spacious Bedrooms with hardwood floors can be found on the main floor as well as an updated full bathroom with ceramic tile floor & convenient tub / shower combination.
The spacious Primary Bedroom comprises the entire second floor and features wood paneled walls and newer carpet.
There is plenty of closet & storage space available on the second floor including built in shelves and an oversized cedar closet to meet your needs.
The partially Finished Basement offers additional living space with a sizable recreation room for your enjoyment with newer carpet and glass block windows.
There is also a half bath located on the lower level.
This home also features a fully fenced in backyard, a wonderful place to enjoy some time outdoors, and a 1 car detached garage with additional storage space.
Located near the Kamm's Corners neighborhood with close proximity to the Metroparks & quick interstate access.
Easy commute to Downtown Cleveland & beyond.
Don't miss the opportunity to see all that this special home has to offer!
